name: SaveTheReactor
description:
A Quantum Physicist works on a Process of mobilization of a Charge Particle under some “Artificial Conditions” created by him/her. Due to a technical fault, the charge particle has gone out of control and is stuck in a room filled with thousands of Tesla Reactors.

Now, The Charge Particle has an initial temp of 30℃ which increases the reactor’s temp 50% each second. Each Reactor’s maximum temperature, that it can withstand is 1500℃, that means he has got just “10 seconds” to change the position of the Particle (from one reactor to another reactor) such that a Reactor does not blow up.

Control-

Left Mouse Click To Throw the Particle

Screenshots -
